caseTitle: Moula Bux Shaikh and others v. The Chief Minister Sindh and others
tagline: It is the domain of the Government to decide whether a particular academic qualification of a civil servant/employee is sufficient for promotion from one grade to another higher grade and whereas it is in the domain of the Pakistan Engineering Council to decide whether a particular academic qualification can be equated with another academic qualification but it has no power to say that the civil servants/employees holding particular academic qualification cannot be promoted from a particular grade to a higher grade.
